news.title: Major Labels Sign Licensing Deals With AI Music Company Klay
news.summary: Klay Vision Inc. is now the first artificial intelligence music startup to land deals with Warner, Universal, and Sony

news.title: Stone Roses and Primal Scream Bassist Gary “Mani” Mounfield Dies at 63
news.summary: The British musician helped the Stone Roses become key figures in the Madchester scene

news.title: Watch Charli XCX Parody Her Brat Era in Teaser Trailer for New Movie The Moment
news.summary: Directed by Aidan Zamiri, the feature film also stars Rachel Sennott, Alexander Skarsgård, and Kylie Jenner

news.title: First Two Alan Vega Solo Albums to Be Reissued by Sacred Bones
news.summary: 1980’s Alan Vega and 1981’s Collision Drive arrive on digital streaming platforms for the first time on January 23

news.title: Spotify Acquires WhoSampled, Announces Expanded Song Credits
news.summary: The sample-sourcing website will continue to operate “as a standalone platform and brand,” according to a statement
